name: Bolota
description:
Bolota, a lovely rounded square, loves to eat apples! You need to control and help Bolota to eat as much as possible, avoiding the enemies. You can also pick some items that will help you to score higher!

Bolota is a simple game, that can be played quickly, to distract you while waiting for something, or when you need just to relax a bit! The game is available in Google Play Store.
